long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch videos together.

Moduda — Korean for "together", 모두다— offers a social viewing experience, complete with a suite of features that are partially missing in other similar apps:

1) Audio-only chat
2) Admin-only controls (configurable) and party synchronisation 
3) Hide/erase chat
4) BetterTTV emotes in the chat 

Getting started with Moduda is a seamless process — just click on the icon while you're on the page with the video that you want to start watching with others, type in an username (optional) and click "Create a new party!". Once you're connected, you will set an invite link at the top which you share this with your friends. You can then watch videos together on your favourite platforms, including Youtube and Netflix.

If you want to check out Moduda, check out these links:

Official website:
https://www.moduda.live

Github link:
https://github.com/moduda-live/moduda...

Have fun friends!
